meanings.definition: A position in which one supports oneself on the head with the body vertical.
meanings.sent1: During yoga class, Sarah practiced her headstands to improve her balance.
meanings.sent2: Gymnasts often include headstands in their routines to showcase their strength.
meanings.sent3: The clown attempted a headstand but ended up tumbling over in a comical fashion.
meanings.sent4: In the circus act, the performer effortlessly transitioned from a handstand to a headstand.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ballerina gracefully holding a headstand stayed in the audience's minds.

meanings.sent1: I can't wait to see you attempt headstands during our next workout session.
meanings.sent2: She headstands every morning as part of her fitness routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to imitate the yoga instructor by doing headstands, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to headstands paid off when he finally achieved perfect balance.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's ability to effortlessly headstands amazed the crowd at the competition.
